title: ‘We Know This Works’: Visma and Vingegaard Bullish on Comeback Plan for Pogačar Rematch
content:
Trainer backs controversial altitude-heavy, race-lite approach to Tour de France as Vingegaard scrambles back from concussion: 'No point worrying about Pogačar.'

Read the full article at ‘We Know This Works’: Visma and Vingegaard Bullish on Comeback Plan for Pogačar Rematch on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
